subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Tom O’Connell has been an agent for 10 years, and he represents about 60 baseball players, mostly in the minor leagues. He may have just met his toughest challenge.
snippet: Tom O’Connell has been an agent for 10 years, and he represents about 60 baseball players, mostly in the minor leagues. He may have just met his toughest challenge.
